actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To authorize appropriations for the Community Development Financial Institutions Fund providing financial assistance and technical assistance for the benefit of certain minority communities, and for other purposes.

summary.text: This bill authorizes additional funding for financial assistance and technical assistance under the Community Development Financial Institutions Fund, with a specified amount set aside for minority lending institutions.

titles.title: To authorize appropriations for the Community Development Financial Institutions Fund providing financial assistance and technical assistance for the benefit of certain minority communities, and for other purposes.

To authorize appropriations for the Community Development Financial Institutions Fund providing financial assistance and technical assistance for the benefit of certain minority communities, and for other purposes.
